description: Remove media in Mageia. Note: Mageia documentation uses medium and repository as synonymous. See also: urpmi, urpme, urpmi.addmedia, urpmi.update, urpmf, urpmq. More information: https://wiki.mageia.org/en/URPMI#urpmi.removemedia.

useCases.description: Remove media fuzz[y] matching on media names:
